conclusion: The graph is an x-t graph with time on the x-axis and position on the y-axis.
The slope of the x-t graph represents the velocity of the car.
The line passes through the point (0, 10) on the graph.
The slope is calculated using points (0, 10) and (2, 20), resulting in a slope of 5 m/s.
The velocity of the car is 5 m/s based on the slope of the graph.
The acceleration is zero because the velocity is constant.
The car's acceleration from the start of timing is 0 m/sÂ².
